title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-5.1 - Guaranties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-5.1 - Guaranties

State Regulations

Any guarantee established in accordance with the
regulations of the Federal Trade Commission issued under the Federal Flammable

Fabrics Act shall be acceptable for purposes of section 505 of article 29 of
the General Business Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
80-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
